[Page Title: The Longboard | Seafood Restaurant & Raw Bar on Sullivan's Island, SC]

Home
Main content starts here, tab to start navigating Slide 1 of 9 Slide 2 of 9 Slide 3 of 9 Slide 4 of 9 Slide 5 of 9 Slide 6 of 9 Slide 7 of 9 Slide 8 of 9 Slide 9 of 9 hero gallery paused, press to play images slides Playing hero gallery, press to pause images slides 
Our Story

The Longboard – Sullivan’s Island is the second iteration of The Longboard concept, originally born on St. John, USVI. The flagship location opened May 1, 2015 in the heart of Cruz Bay, St. John, offering light & healthy fares and creative cocktails inspired by coastal regions around the globe.
Learn More 
Merchandise

Longboard gear looks good on you. Hats + koozies + oyster knives + face buffs + more . . .
Available exclusively at The Longboard! 
Give the gift of The Longboard

Give the gift of good eats & delicious drinks with a Longboard e-gift card.
